scripts.postinstall: npm run install:bower && npm run install:composer && npm run install:links
scripts.install:composer: php composer.phar install || (curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php && php composer.phar install)
scripts.install:links: npm run install:links:wordpress && npm run install:links:theme
scripts.install:links:wordpress: ([ ! -e public ] && bash scripts/symlink.sh public vendor/WordPress) || true
scripts.build: npm install && npm run build:js && npm run build:less
scripts.build:js: node node_modules/requirejs/bin/r.js -o BaseUrl=src/js/ name=../bower_components/requirejs/require include=requirejs-config,bootstrap insertRequire=bootstrap mainConfigFile=src/js/requirejs-config.js out=src/js/main-build.js
